class="fixed inset-y-0 right-0 z-20 w-full max-w-xs bg-white shadow-xl dark:bg-darker dark:text-light sm:max-w-md focus:outline-none" aria-labelledby="settingsPanelLabel"> <div class="absolute left-0 p-2 transform -translate-x-full"> <!-- Close button --> <button @click="isSettingsPanelOpen = false" class="p-2 text-white rounded-md focus:outline-none focus:ring"> <svg class="w-5 h-5" style="background-color: var(--color-cyan)"></button> <button @click="setColors('teal')" class="w-10 h-10 rounded-full" style="background-color: var(--color-teal)"></button> <button @click="setColors('green')" class="w-10 h-10 rounded-full" style="background-color: var(--color-green)"></button> <button @click="setColors('fuchsia')" class="w-10 h-10 rounded-full" style="background-color: var(--color-fuchsia)"></button> <button @click="setColors('blue')" class="w-10 h-10 rounded-full" style="background-color: var(--color-blue)"></button> <button @click="setColors('violet')" class="w-10 h-10 rounded-full" style="background-color: var(--color-violet)"></button> </div> </div> </div> </div> </div> <!-- Search panel --> <!-- Backdrop --> <div x-cloak x-transition:enter="transition duration-300 ease-in-out" x-transition:enter-start="opacity-0" x-transition:enter-end="opacity-100" x-transition:leave="transition duration-300 ease-in-out" x-transition:leave-start="opacity-100" x-transition:leave-end="opacity-0" x-show="isSearchPanelOpen" @click="isSearchPanelOpen = false" class="fixed inset-0 z-10 bg-primary-darker" style="opacity: 0.5" aria-hidden="ture"></div> <!-- Panel --> <div x-cloak x-transition:enter="transition duration-300 ease-in-out transform sm:duration-500" x-transition:enter-start="-translate-x-full" x-transition:enter-end="translate-x-0" x-transition:leave="transition duration-300 ease-in-out transform sm:duration-500" x-ref="searchInput" x-transition:leave-start="translate-x-0" x-transition:leave-end="-translate-x-full" x-show="isSearchPanelOpen" @keydown.escape="isSearchPanelOpen = false" class="fixed inset-y-0 z-20 w-full max-w-xs bg-white shadow-xl dark:bg-darker dark:text-light sm:max-w-md focus:outline-none"> <div class="absolute right-0 p-2 transform translate-x-full"> <!-- Close button --> <button @click="isSearchPanelOpen = false" class="p-2 text-white rounded-md focus:outline-none focus:ring"> <svg class="w-5 h-5" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke="currentColor"> <path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M6 18L18 6M6 6l12 12" /> </svg> </button> </div>
<span class="sr-only">Search panel</span> <!-- Panel content --> <div class="flex flex-col h-screen"> <!-- Panel header (Search input) -->
</div> </div>
const setup = () => { const getTheme = () => { if (window.localStorage.getItem('dark')) { return JSON.parse(window.localStorage.getItem('dark')) }
return false }
const setTheme = (value) => { window.localStorage.setItem('dark', value) document.getElementById("set-theme").classList.toggle("dark", value) }
const getColor = () => { if (window.localStorage.getItem('color')) { return window.localStorage.getItem('color') } return 'blue' }
const setColors = (color) => { const root = document.documentElement root.style.setProperty('--color-primary', `var(--color-${color})`) root.style.setProperty('--color-primary-50', `var(--color-${color}-50)`) root.style.setProperty('--color-primary-100', `var(--color-${color}-100)`) root.style.setProperty('--color-primary-light', `var(--color-${color}-light)`) root.style.setProperty('--color-primary-lighter', `var(--color-${color}-lighter)`) root.style.setProperty('--color-primary-dark', `var(--color-${color}-dark)`) root.style.setProperty('--color-primary-darker', `var(--color-${color}-darker)`) this.selectedColor = color window.localStorage.setItem('color', color) }
return { isDark: getTheme(), toggleTheme() { this.isDark = !this.isDark setTheme(this.isDark) }, setLightTheme() { this.isDark = false setTheme(this.isDark) }, setDarkTheme() { this.isDark = true setTheme(this.isDark) }, color: getColor(), selectedColor: 'blue', setColors, toggleSidbarMenu() { this.isSidebarOpen = !this.isSidebarOpen }, isSettingsPanelOpen: false, openSettingsPanel() { this.isSettingsPanelOpen = true this.$nextTick(() => { this.$refs.settingsPanel.focus() }) }, isSearchPanelOpen: false, openSearchPanel() { this.isSearchPanelOpen = true this.$nextTick(() => { this.$refs.searchInput.focus() }) }, isMobileSubMenuOpen: false, openMobileSubMenu() { this.isMobileSubMenuOpen = true this.$nextTick(() => { this.$refs.mobileSubMenu.focus() }) }, isMobileMainMenuOpen: false, openMobileMainMenu() { this.isMobileMainMenuOpen = true this.$nextTick(() => { this.$refs.mobileMainMenu.focus() }) } } }

var entryContent = document.getElementsByClassName("entry-content")[0]; var elementsA = entryContent.getElementsByTagName("a"); var elementsPre = entryContent.getElementsByTagName("pre"); var elementsTable = entryContent.getElementsByTagName("table"); var elementsCode = entryContent.getElementsByTagName("code"); var elementsBlockquote = entryContent.getElementsByTagName("blockquote"); var elementsImage = entryContent.getElementsByTagName("img"); var elementsSeparator = entryContent.getElementsByClassName("separator"); for (var i=0; i<elementsA.length; i++) {elementsA[i].classList.add('underline','font-semibold','hover:font-bold');}for (var i=0; i<elementsPre.length; i++) {elementsPre[i].classList.add('whitespace-pre-wrap','p-2','rounded-xl','bg-light');}for (var i=0; i<elementsTable.length; i++) { elementsTable[i].classList.add('w-full');}for (var i=0; i<elementsCode.length; i++) { elementsCode[i].classList.add('bg-light','text-primary-dark');}for (var i=0; i<elementsBlockquote.length; i++) { elementsBlockquote[i].classList.add('text-lg','font-semibold');}for (var i=0; i<elementsImage.length; i++) { elementsImage[i].classList.add('mx-auto','rounded-xl');}for (var i=0; i<elementsSeparator.length; i++) { elementsSeparator[i].classList.add('my-2');}docReady(function(){const getTitle=e=>fetch(e).then(e=>e.text()).then(e=>{return(new DOMParser).parseFromString(e,"text/html").querySelectorAll("title")[0].innerText}),replaceBlogName=e=>e.replace(" | ","");var olderLinkPagination=document.getElementById("Blog1_blog-pager-older-link"),newerLinkPagination=document.getElementById("Blog1_blog-pager-newer-link");if(newerLinkPagination){getTitle(newerLinkPagination.getAttribute("a-href")).then(e=>{newerLinkPagination.innerHTML=replaceBlogName(e)+" ▶"})}if(olderLinkPagination){getTitle(olderLinkPagination.getAttribute("a-href")).then(e=>{olderLinkPagination.innerHTML="◀ "+replaceBlogName(e)})}});docReady(function(){var
